description: Schema for general collector of performance metrics

generated.description: Stored in DB but build date is used for all tests to have the same time. We also support other formats, for example: RFC1123Z, RFC1123, 'Jan 2, 2006, 3:04:05 PM MST', 'Mon, 2 Jan 2006 15:04:05 -0700', 'Mon, 2 Jan 2006 15:04:05 MST', '20060102T150405+0000'

build.description: Required in case test is run on installers. Build number of installer

buildDate.description: Required in case test is run on installers. Build date of installer

projectURL.description: URL of the project in case zip is used.

projectDescription.description: Description of the project to be shown on hover

productCode.description: Not used yet, product code. Example, IJ, PS.

methodName.description: Used to provide code navigation to the test method.

mode.description: Mode of the test. Example, 'split', 'customJBR', 'Kotlin K2'.

owner.description: Owner of the project/test, e.g. 'IntelliJ Kotlin Plugin'

d.description: Metric value - duration. Should be in milliseconds or nanoseconds. Will be converted to human readable time.

v.description: Metric value - duration or count. Not used.

c.description: Metric value - count. Values are not modified on UI and show as is.
